# addCompletion(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an animation completion block to run when a view animation has ended.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addCompletion(_ completion: @escaping (UIViewAnimatingPosition) -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: A block that sets animatable view properties.

## Adding animations

- **addAnimations(_:)**: Adds an animation block for modifying a view animation while it’s running.
